summary: Defines a Neural Graph Collaborative Filtering model that learns user and item representations through graph convolutional layers and supports forward propagation, Bayesian Personalized Ranking loss computation, and rating prediction. Includes a generic graph convolution layer implementation used by the model.
business_intent: Enable personalized recommendation by exploiting the structure of user‑item interaction graphs to improve ranking accuracy for e‑commerce, media streaming, or any platform requiring tailored item suggestions.
